When installing the package, R installer should automatically install all the relevant python dependencies (namely `delphi-utils`). However, there might be issues with regards to this installation procedure (esp. on Windows machines). As such, we also provide a custom function to provide manual installation   

```{r manual_install, eval=FALSE}
install_delphi_utils()
```

Let's load the packages once the proper dependencies are installed.  

```{r setup}
library(gtsibble)
library(covidcast)
library(epiprocess)
```
